title: Heal Here Now
author: Heal Here Now
description: Empowering you to live your best life
cleaned_text: Transform Your Life Today Empowering you to live your best life Transform Your Life Today Empowering you to live your best life Empowering you to live your best life Empowering you to live your best life In the state of Washington, naturopathic physicians are primary care doctors who can order tests and imaging, prescribe medications, refer to specialists and diagnose disease. They have special training in using diet, vitamins, herbs, homeopathy, manual and energetic techniques to treat disease. We are bombarded by new health trends every year. What is right for someone else may not be right for you. I look at each patient as an individual with unique needs. Through laboratory and in-office testing- as well as much discussion- we arrive at a treatment plan that fits your diagnosis, your body and your lifestyle. I see people of all ages for acute and chronic health concerns, well child visits, sports physicals, and B12 shots. I can also discuss vaccines and sign Washington state vaccine exemption forms. Heal Here Now is also a certified medical test site in WA for COVID and influenza testing We use cookies to analyze website traffic and optimize your website experience. By accepting our use of cookies, your data will be aggregated with all other user data. We will be at 11815 NE HWY 99 until September 15th. After that we will be at our new location: 1612 NE 78th St.
